body: So the story after the tank girls is about a daughter of a yakuza who was about to be engaged to an old man yakuza friend of her father so she rushed to come to the house of the man she loves to confess (since she's single as no one wants to date her out of fear for being the daughter of a yakuza) and to give her virginity as to make love to be impregnated so that her father won't be able to wed her to the old man yakuza friend of his.
